title: Nike Headlines
content:
Working on a class assignment that need to reflect the Nike brand. I've attached a sample of the headlines that i'm trying to get approximately. If anyone has a font suggestion that is ballpark, that would be wonderful. Just the headline please and thank you.

Bokkah

comments.content: Looks like Futura extra bold condensed.
